title: Curly and fun...it looks to be modified font..can you help me?
content:
I would like to know if this font exists or if this is modified? I love it!

 [‹ NIKE V-SERIES PROMOTIONAL MATERIAL , UNKNOWN FONT ?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213032/http:/typophile.com/node/44408 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID Masthead Fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213032/http:/typophile.com/node/44384 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Corrim

comments.content:
This might be custom. I could be wrong.  
Similar: [Bodoni Classic Swashes](http://web.archive.org/web/20080423213032/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/wiescher/bodoni_classic_roman_swashes/)
I think you’re right. It’s a cross between didot and bodini with flair like affair. Thanks for your help!!
